item.title: Globalization isn’t over — but now it’s going to make Americans poorer
item.description: Trump’s tariffs can be effective only if other nations don’t retaliate. That isn’t happening.

item.title: ‘I am suspicious’: My father died, leaving me $250,000. My brother says it’s all gone. What can I do?
item.description: “My brother and I are named as co-executors in his will.”

item.title: ‘I’m 15 years older’: My second wife says she will pass my estate onto my sons. What could go wrong?
item.description: “My wife is probably one of the most honest persons I’ve ever known.”

item.title: ‘She’s kept him afloat’: I’m 78 and leaving my daughter, 41, my life savings, but her partner doesn’t pay rent. What do I do?
item.description: “He keeps losing jobs and going on unemployment.”

item.title: Bill Cosby lists New York townhouse for $7 million after being sued for defaulting on a loan
item.description: Cosby has quietly listed one of his two New York City townhouses amid an ongoing foreclosure battle over that property and another of his Manhattan ho...
